traits.name: Sensitive to Light
traits.desc: When you take radiant damage, you're also blinded until the start of your next turn.

traits.name: Club
traits.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Concussive Attack
traits.desc: When you critically hit a target with an attack, it must make a Constitution saving throw DC 12 or be Stunned until the end of its next turn.
